# selectedDetentIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The identifier of the most recently selected detent.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedDetentIdentifier: UISheetPresentationController.Detent.Identifier? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property represents the most recent detent that the user selects or that you set programmatically. The default value is `nil`, which means the sheet displays at the smallest detent you specify in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISheetPresentationController/detents].

## Specifying the height

- **detents**: The array of heights where a sheet can rest.
- **UISheetPresentationController.Detent**: An object that represents a height where a sheet naturally rests.
